```{python}
import pandas as pd
import plotly.express as px

# load your submission file

pred = pd.read_csv("submission_regression2.csv")  # contains PID + SalePrice

rmse = 0.15686
n_houses = len(pred)

summary = pred["SalePrice"].describe()
min_p = summary["min"]
median_p = summary["50%"]
mean_p = summary["mean"]
max_p = summary["max"]
```
